name: Press 'Till The End
description:
Hello ! 

This is my contribution to the Ludum Dare 46. 

It is a music/rhythmish game where you have to make people dance by successfully press your key at the right timing. 

CVB & Left/Up/Middle Arrows to play !

OK... It is more a test for myself than a real game from itself. Sorry about it ! But at the end, it was fun to produced ! I hope you will still like the challenge and make the character dance till the end and keep them alive ! 

Pro tips: Watch the forms and colors. 

Special thanks to the artists who produced the amazing songs !
